responsibility:
* Write clean, reusable, and maintainable code.
* Participate in code reviews to ensure high-quality standards.
* Develop scalable, modular web applications with a focus on security and stability.
* Collaborate with teams to build advanced AI-driven solutions.
* Deliver well-structured and documented code.
requirement:
*   Strong JavaScript or TypeScript skills
*   Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience
*   Strong understanding of ES6 and frameworks like Node.js or React
*   Knowledge of front-end, back-end, or full-stack development
*   Ability to write clean, reusable, maintainable, well-structured, and documented code
*   Ability to develop scalable, modular web applications with a focus on security and stability
*   Ability to participate in code reviews
*   Ability to collaborate with teams to build advanced AI-driven solutions
*   Good spoken and written communication skills in English

responsibility:
* Lead the development of cutting-edge web applications using React to improve user experiences.
* Collaborate closely with UI/UX designers to create accessible, intuitive, and visually appealing interfaces.
* Optimize performance using advanced React techniques (code-splitting, lazy loading, tree-shaking) to ensure fast load times and scalability.
* Integrate with RESTful, OData, and GraphQL APIs, ensuring seamless data flow and robust functionality.
* Mentor and guide junior developers, fostering a collaborative and innovative environment.
* Deploy React applications using Azure Static Web Apps, optimizing the deployment process via CI/CD pipelines in GitHub Actions.
* Continuously test and debug to ensure code quality and application stability.
requirement:
*   6+ years of front-end development experience with React
*   Micro-frontend architecture
*   Azure Static Web Apps (experience deploying web applications)
*   OData services
*   Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+)
*   HTML5
*   CSS3
*   Docker
*   Kubernetes
*   Progressive Web Applications (PWA)
*   State management tools (Redux, Context API)
*   TypeScript
*   Familiarity with tools like Git, Webpack, and component libraries (e.g., Material-UI, Tailwind CSS)
*   Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Cypress)
*   Building scalable, maintainable codebases
*   Familiarity with RESTful APIs and GraphQL
*   Expertise in CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions) for automating testing, building, and deployment
*   Knowledge of server-side rendering

responsibility:
*   Transform designs into functional, visually appealing web applications.
*   Build responsive layouts.
*   Improve user experiences.
*   Work with modern frameworks.
requirement:
*   Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, IT, or related fields
*   Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
*   Familiarity with frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue
*   Understanding of responsive design principles

responsibility:
*   Lead the planning, design and execution of high-volume data migration projects, ensuring integrity, performance and security.
*   Collaborate closely with stakeholders to analyse legacy systems, define data mapping and transformation requirements, and develop robust ETL processes.
*   Work as a senior member of an Agile/Scrum team, partnering with Solution Architects, Developers and Testers to deliver seamless migrations.
*   Write, review and optimise migration scripts and WinForms utilities using C# and SQL Server.
*   Mentor and upskill more junior team members in database best practices, coding standards and data migration techniques.
*   Drive continuous improvement by investigating emerging tools and methodologies to enhance scalability and maintainability.
requirement:
*   Minimum 5 years’ experience in a data migration or similar .NET/database development role.
*   Tertiary degree in Computer Science, IT or related discipline (or equivalent experience).
*   Deep expertise in C#, ADO.NET/Entity Framework, SQL Server (T-SQL, performance tuning), and WinForms.
*   Proven track record designing and delivering ETL solutions, data cleansing, and validation.
*   Solid understanding of the full SDLC, with hands-on experience in Agile software delivery.
*   Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a passion for data quality.
*   Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with a collaborative mindset and willingness to share knowledge.
*   Dependency Injection
*   Octopus Deploy
*   SOLID principles
*   TeamCity
*   Web API
*   .NET Core
*   AWS
*   Azure
*   Azure Data Factory
*   Azure DevOps
*   Git
*   TDD
*   .NET
*   Ability to lead the planning, design, and execution of high-volume data migration projects, ensuring integrity, performance, and security.
*   Ability to collaborate with stakeholders to analyse legacy systems, define data mapping and transformation requirements, and develop robust ETL processes.
*   Ability to mentor and upskill more junior team members in database best practices, coding standards, and data migration techniques.
*   Ability to drive continuous improvement by investigating emerging tools and methodologies.
*   Experience with SSIS or other cloud-based data integration platforms.
